tosdr.case: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service

title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold Healthline, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers harmless from and against any claims, actions or demands, liabilities, and settlements, including without limitation reasonable legal and accounting fees, resulting from, or alleged to result from, (i) your use of and access of the Services, (ii) your violation of any term of these Terms of Use, (iii) your violation of any third party right, including without limitation any copyright, property, or privacy right, or (iv) any claim that your use of the Services caused damage to a third party.
